#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#define Size 1009
#define LL long long int
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
LL DP[Size][Size];
LL BionomialCoeficient(LL n,LL r)
{
    if(r>n) return 0;
    if(DP[n][r]!=-1) return DP[n][r];
    if(r==0 or n==r) return 1;
    else return DP[n][r]=DP[n][n-r]= (BionomialCoeficient(n-1,r) + BionomialCoeficient(n-1,r-1)) %Size;
}
LL Bionomi(LL n,LL r)
{
    if(r==0 and n==0) return 1;
    if(r>n) return 0;
    return (BionomialCoeficient(n%Size,r%Size))*(Bionomi(n/Size,r/Size)) % Size;
}
int main()
{
    LL t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    memset(DP,-1,sizeof(DP));
    while(t--)
    {
        LL n,r;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&r);
        printf("%lld\n",Bionomi(n,r));
    }
}
